name: Baked Apple Chips
author: Nancy JimsWife
summary: Baked apple chips are easy to make, loaded with fiber, and have the crunchy satisfaction of potato chips with a fraction of the fat and calories.
ingredients: 4  Granny Smith apples, cored and sliced into very thin rounds
directions: Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Line two baking sheets with parchment paper
Whisk sugar and cinnamon together in a large bowl
Add apple slices and toss to coat
Arrange apple slices in a single layer on prepared baking sheets
Bake apples in the preheated oven until browned and just crisped, about 2 hours
